title: "Do Not Disturb" no longer turns on while driving. How can I fix this?
content:
Pixel 2 XL:

I have "Do Not Disturb" set to turn on automatically while I'm driving:
Settings > Apps & notifications > Notifications > Advanced > Do Not Disturb > Schedules > Driving (on)

This used to work well, but for a while, it has no longer turned on while I'm driving.

How can I get it to start working again, please?
